dct_title_s: Road map of India / prepared under the direction of the Chief of Engineers by the Army Map Service ; reproduced ... from pulls of a Survey of India 1942 edition map.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading, spot heights, and gradient tints. Includes two insets: [Extension to east]--[Extension to west]
dct_publisher_sm: Washington, D.C. : Army Map Service, U.S. Army, 1944.
